data.text: @nzherald Why is it breaking news? Breaking news should be now that NZ sports stadiums are empty after boasting the first country to have full stadiums 🤦🏿‍♂️😂
@nzherald Keep 'em coming! Drop mandates and masks.

@SandieBlickem @nzherald Orrrr our government are a bunch of idiots who say we wanna stop covid.... But open our borders to kiwis who don't have to self isolate.... Like how do you expect to beat it if your not controlling how people come and go from NZ
@nzherald 🤣🤡🖕Worse than North Korea; led by a deranged and psycho autocrat bint w/ zero results to show for after hermit nation cutoff for 2 years. What a moron country.

@matlar007 @shauno1977 @nzherald Says the the obviously delusional egotistical fool using an equally delusional cartoon character 🤣 so far up your own ass, don't even realize you're the despised party.
@nzherald Lol this guy has no business stating anything on covid after his latest attempt at bullshitting

@TockTick1776 @nzherald When was ardern credible..? I must have missed that. She wont win any Oscars for acting empathetic. But the contemptuous sneer will go down well in a horror movie when this gig ends.
